file_content.text: Hello? Who there?
You must be bounty hunter Blizz always talking ear off about.
Ah, you must be stranger-person Blizz talk ears off about.
You're Preeti, right?
Hi! You nice. No wonder Blizz always talk about you.
You're Nu'na, right?
Um, that not me.
You're Dakk'ik, right?
Um, that not me.
R'bik?
*sigh*
You're R'bik, right?
Um, that not me.
Preeti?
Nu'na?
*sigh*
You look like a Dakk'ik to me.
Preeti bet you not know what Dakk'ik look like either.
Dakk'ik?
*sigh*
It has to be Preeti then.
There you go.
You look like a Nu'na to me.
Preeti bet you not know what Nu'na look like either.
Forget it, I have something for you.
I guess I should be flattered.
Blizz talk lots about lots of things.
Blizz say you supposed to bring thing for me.
Blizz not tell you who Preeti is? You at least bring right thing for Preeti... right?
[Give Laser-Torch]
Um, no. Preeti not want to set things on fire.
[Give Sniff-Machine]
Um, no. Preeti smell just fine.
[Give Socks]
Um, no. Preeti still have all toes and like to keep that way.
[Give Sniff-Machine]
Um, no. Preeti smell just fine.
[Give Laser-Torch]
Um, no. Preeti not want to set things on fire.
[Give Socks]
[Give Socks]
Um, no. Preeti still have all toes and like to keep that way.
[Give Vibro-Ear]
[Give Laser-Torch]
*sigh* Preeti need vibro-ear! Why can't people listen?
Just tell me what you want!
Sheesh, why you so loud? Preeti not deaf. Only want vibro-ear for spying.
This perfect! Now Preeti can drop eaves from safe place and maybe hear something useful.
Hope you find it useful.
What's that supposed to do exactly?
It listen to shaking near things so Preeti hear far away and through walls. Preeti probably have to tune out chatter of teeth.
Do that. I'm tired of this ice ball.
What? Oh, sorry, was trying new ear-thing.
Thanks for help!
Sshh! Quiet. Preeti use ear-thing to hear wampa!
[Give Vibro-Ear]
